website_summaries.verdict: For those seeking an elegant costume with a royal flare, this Queen Of Hearts design fits the bill. Works as both a theatrical and Halloween costume.
pros: Beautiful details, with full skirt and bodice
cons: Not an ideal fit for very petite women
Sheds a significant amount of glitter.Costume requires careful fluffing and other adjustments before use

customer_reviews.title: Off with your head
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from Amazon. IT WAS A HIT! My student went crazy. I am 5'7, 40ddd and about 220 lbs in this picture. The outfit was a bit larger than I would have wanted. I think it was a16/18. The belt was too large as well. The sleeves are also itchy. I know you are probably wondering why I rated it so high...but don't I look cute? Shut up and off with your head.
customer_reviews.author: Dee El

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Wore this to Disneyland for their Halloween party. Got lots of great complements. I did purchase a long white slip to wear underneath as the white part is see through. The "corset" just ties on and isn't cinching in any way. I used another corset belt I had to get more shape. I'm short, so had to hem it a little (I'm 5'2" and had to hem about 6" off). Was very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: S. McCreath

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful! I'm so happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful! I'm so happy with my purchase, it is made with nice materials and the colors are bright. I enjoyed wearing this at a halloween party. I am 5'4 and I wore flats with it, it didn't drag on the floor and it hid my shoes nicely. I paired it with a wig and crazy queen of hearts make-up. I had so much fun wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: dt93313

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous costume for the price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is really fabulous!! I love that it is nice and long, and its a good design and quality. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the corset is really just okay, its a little awkward trying to find where it sits best. I think I will get another under the bust corset to go with it and that should be perfect. But for the price and the quality of the rest of it, its really great. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful costume but runs very large!
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a size 6, but ordered the dress in a medium because I have a large chest (36 D) and figured it would accommodate since most costumes run small. Even with my most padded pushup bra I could not fill out this costume. I was literally swimming in fabric in the chest and waist. I returned it and reordered it in a size small. Other than that, the gown is very pretty with nice thick fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: I used the chart to find my measurements. I typically wear a 10/12 dress. however the measurements showed me as standard size. I didn't want it to small so I ordered that size because of the chest size. It came and it said 14/16. I Wass little worried it would be to big.It fit perfect. It looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bonitatibus

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Fit good since I was 8 1/2 months pregnant. Don't think it would have if I was my normal size. Wanted to wear a tank under it but it was too low cut to be able to. Which wasn't horrible because it was not revealing but stunk because the tulle underneath was incredible itchy. Good quality. Happy with purchase over all.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Received a used costume
customer_reviews.text: The quality is what you'd expect from a costume. This particular costume however, had frayed edges in a few places, a small hole in the tool, and a makeup smudge on the white collar. Also, the black tie around the waist also has deep wrinkles in it, as if someone bent over a lot while wearing it. I'm angry that I paid $30 for a used, dirty product. However, I have a function I need to attend in a day and a half so I'm up a creek without a paddle. I'm very disappointed that a company would reship a costume, particularly without inspecting it. I'm also disappointed in Amazon for using companies who'd do such shady business.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I'm 5'8 and wear size 12-16 ha
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I'm 5'8 and wear size 12-16 ha! Dress was perfect in every way, buy a corset to make the dress fit like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!!! Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely blown away by the quality of this dress!! My daughter spends hundreds on her cosplay costumes so to be honest I was not expecting this dress to be as awesome as it is!! I bought both small and medium to get the best fit, I’m returning the medium. I am 5”4 and 138 pounds so the small was perfect for me. A bit shorter than I like but I have a petticoat underneath, I highly recommend it because it totally makes the dress. Since it’s shoter I don’t need to wear heels all night. So very impressed and excited to wear this!! I’ll definitely purchase from this company again!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a special Valentine's Day stream I was doing and it was just what I was looking for. And the price can't be beat! It had a lot of details that I didn't expect (glitter on the collar, softer materials). This was well worth the price, honestly. And it was a big hit on stream! Word of warning tho.. Its now March and I'm still finding random glitter in places. Also, this needs a slip (get a nude slip, white will show thru against your skin). The front gauze part is see-through. Not SUPER obvious. But obvious if you're looking.
customer_reviews.author: N. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Well made but too big and room
customer_reviews.text: Way too big. Ordered XL by the size chart and it’s huge. Also front is sheer so you need to wear leggings under it. Not sure if the collar will stay up, but we will see. Still not sure if I will keep it or return for a smaller size. It was wrinkled but ten minutes in a steamy bathroom did the trick. It is well made, but order a size smaller than you think you need. It is a pullover and has a stretchy back. Hoping my makeup doesn’t get ruined trying to put it on. Happy to have the corset piece to make it fit better but that is also a little big.
customer_reviews.author: FlamingoMo

customer_reviews.title: Mine was not made correct
customer_reviews.text: I think it would have been perfect if it had been made right, the one I received had part sewn up in the wrong area, almost like it got caught in the machine on accident so it didn't hang right, I thought about trying to cut it off so it would hang right but was worried too much fabric would be missing and it would look worse, just decided to return instead
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. I plan to use this costume in a promo appearance for a summer children's theater performance of "Alice in Wonderland." It is actually of good enough quality, we may use it for the performances as well as the promo. The bustier/corset is not boned, so if you want an hourglass figure, use a "real" corset underneath the costume. The front panel is somewhat see-through, especially with stage lighting, so wear something opaque underneath. The skirt is really, really long, so if you are petite you'll have to do some hemming. I'd recommend this as an all-purpose costume for Halloween, theater, or any other fancy-dress party.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: It Fits!! 😻😻😻
customer_reviews.text: Thank You!! I was honestly worried I would drown in it!?( I’m barely a sz2 and I’m pretty short) but luckily, it works!! I need heels w it but it will be Perfect for my Little Family Halloween costumes! It’s actually better material than I expected and I’m confident it will keep me warm-ish on Halloween Night. And Thanks for fast shipping!! 😻
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Rose

customer_reviews.title: Feeling like the Queen I am!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for and a WAY better price than the store!! It was definitely too big. I ordered by the measurements and I’m Usually right on when it comes to measurements but i love it and it still Looks good. I put a large crinoline skirt under from my wedding dress to get the ball gown look. I got so many compliments!! I won best costume. The best!
customer_reviews.author: Queen of the Castle

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as description correct size
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! As the price is low I was wondering about the quality, but this is pretty good and beautiful custom, the only complain is this do not include the crown, but is exactly as a description. Correct size maybe a little little big but nothing to worries about I’m normally size 10-12 Xl fit very big, I return and order a new large size and fit correctly. Super fast delivery and clean packaging. Very recomendable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kane

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!!
customer_reviews.text: Loves the product. Fits as a large (which is what I expected) It does not have a slip or anything under it. So the very see through white tool in front is more of a peep show, I'm gonna have to add some white material which is kind of inconvenient. There are slits about 2 inches long on the hips of the corset So it doesn't lay flat no matter how much you tighten it.
customer_reviews.author: HANNAH CLINGE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful costume and well made :) we turned our annual Halloween party into our surprise wedding and this dress was absolutely perfect as a Queen of Hearts costume/wedding dress, my only complaint would be the middle part not tightening up enough when tying, but most don't have my body type so shouldn't be a problem. Loved the dress, I got tons of compliments on it, even before surprising everyone with our wedding
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good the second time I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I had to order this twice. The first one arrived with the skirt sewn on crooked and some of the gold trim falling off. The second one is much better. Ordered a small, I'm 5’2”, and it will be floor length with a medium height heel - so, perfect for me. The corset is the worst part, the rest of the costume is great for the money. At least the second time around.
customer_reviews.author: C M

customer_reviews.title: Great costume, runs big
customer_reviews.text: The costume is beautiful and seems to be well made. The only issue I had was the size, I found that the costume ran large. I have more of an hourglass figure and am bigger in the hips. I normally wear a size 14 and I tried both the XL and the large, both were to big. Had I had more time I would have ordered the medium and been super excited to wear it to the Halloween party.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Ok but you'll need a slip on underneath.
customer_reviews.text: Wish they had an x-small. I am 5'3" and 115 lbs and it was a bit big. Also, I was surprised that for the price you can see right through the white in the front. There is no lining under the white crinoline! Also it was very long. I'll need to him it or lift as I walk.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great costume.
customer_reviews.text: I wore this project to a party. Everyone loved it. It got a little hot. But not too bad. I plan to make it my costume for Halloween also.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: When I open the package, I realized the corset belt does not attach to the dress. I was disappointed, only because I can’t tie it from the back due to the fact my right arm cannot turn or reach the back. The dress is so beautiful. I’m sadden to have to return it. 😭😭
customer_reviews.author: Raider Nation

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it's worth!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5" 130lbs and it was loose around my waist and arms, but the length was perfect. Since it is once size fits most, it was manageable. The corset piece that comes with it doesn't tie tight like the picture, but it helps a little bit. I had to wear my own thick pleated skirt underneath to make the dress poofy. It would have looked better with a petticoat, but since I didn't have one I had to work with what I did have. The neck part doesn't stand up well on its own. Be prepared to have red glitter fall everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: snguyen88

customer_reviews.title: This is a really pretty costume but I looked huge in it
customer_reviews.text: I am not a big person, about 5' and weigh about 128lbs. This is a really pretty costume but I looked huge in it...I removed the under laced slip? It was very itchy and cheap looking. Other than that, I had to cut about 8" off the length. If you are a tall person then it should fit you perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: this costume is great for the money
customer_reviews.text: this costume is great for the money . I ordered a size based on the fact i thought it might fit small but it does not . Collar was fine . If it doesn't stand up right for you just pull it up from front lower neckline where it is attached and put a couple small pins in the front . I didn't use the corset at all . you do need something under it . I just wore black leggins.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this for fairytale character day at the high school.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Im 5'4" and this dress was super long for me at a size large
customer_reviews.text: Im 5'4" and this dress was super long for me at a size large. Had to pin up the front so I wouldn't trip and the back got ruined after wearing it from dragging. Collar barely stayed up like it should. Other than that I got plenty of compliments
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: It is costume quality
customer_reviews.text: Costume quality means it's well made FOR a costume. It was very pretty but very itchy and uncomfortable. When I tried it on I knew I couldn't wear it all day, so returned it and went with a cheap DIY costume instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Completely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The dress came is and I was so excited until I tried it And found the skirt was sewn on crooked. I had ordered it for my friend's surprise Alice in Wonderland party and was devastated. I returned it and dressed up as a mouse instead. It did not live up to the picture at all.
customer_reviews.author: Anna-Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size based on size chart
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2" 200 lbs and according to the sizing chart, an XL should have been comfortable. IT WAS HUGE!!! When it arrived, the package said it was an 18-20 which is much more accurate than the sizing chart. A Medium fit me just perfectly. Not near as busty as the picture shows either, though I am a D cup and the medium still had room for more. Overall great costume for the price. It won me a $50 gift card so it was essentially free!
customer_reviews.author: Ron W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice costume
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the costume twice ordered an ex large it was too big so I exchanged for a large very nice costume for work got a lot of compliments on it. great value the costume well made looked good not cheap looking at all.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie R.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Great costume for the price. My girlfriend and I had a tea party and all the ladies loved it. I did purchase a white slip to go underneath since the front is see through. I am 5'5" 145lbs and small chested. I purchased the medium / large and it worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Eyez

customer_reviews.title: King of Beers and Queen of Hearts
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product for the price. It DOES run large. I am a size 4 with a 34D bust and the small had to be taken in at the bust! The waist cinch thing was too big so I purchased one with elastic at the back and used the gold thread in it. Woked well! Great quality and I did not have trouble with the collar standing up.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, flattering, and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6 and wear M/L. I bought the standard size. It seemed a little big and off in the waist but the corsette finished it off perfectly. It is elegant. The white is see-through but some white tights or stretch pants will look fine. Great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Virginio M. Daversa

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for an away family member. Ordered an XL and she's about a size 16 I believe. She hasn't worn it yet but she says it's a perfect fit and she absolutey loves the costume
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: Halloween Costume Quality - But well done...
customer_reviews.text: This costume is like most Halloween costumes. The fabric quality is low, however, this is not for daily wear so I would not expect more. Everyone loved the costume and it held up very nicely after an evening of partying and dancing! I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Castle

customer_reviews.title: Near Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews, I ordered a Standard size. I am busty with an hourglass figure. I wear a size 12, with the occasional 10 in dresses, and this costume fit perfectly. I took off a start because the corset was not a corset at all (it hung loose and was not stretchy). I already had a black corset from a previous Halloween, so I used that instead and it looked great. Otherwise, this dress was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jen F.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Good costume for the price. It fits perfectly. I'm a size 11 juniors/8-10 womens and it fits me like a glove. There is a small area that needs to be sown but it's not a big deal. However, the waist cincher is useless. It folds over when you try to tighten it. Be prepared to buy your own. I've found some for as little as $3, so the costume is still worth it. The quality is like every other costume. Not great but not too bad. I expected worse for the price. Happily surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Edi

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable costume. I got so many compliments on this. I'm 5'5" 157 pounds & it fit well. It's not heavy and you can't see through it. I only wore Alice in Wonderland thigh highs and was totally comfortable in this outfit. I'd say anyone up to size 14 could easily fit in this costume. Make sure you buy the redish orange wig from Alice in Wonderland... Really made the whole look come together.
customer_reviews.author: OhioNana11

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality costume for the price. Most costumes end u getting one time use but I’ll be able to wear this for years to come. Looks more expensive than it is! I wear a 38G and am a size 12-14/16 and the large fit perfect! If you have larger upper arms, size up because it doesn’t stretch in that area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddicted

customer_reviews.title: Contest winner
customer_reviews.text: Total winner! I’m 6’1” so had to pick the larger size for height. Totally is long enough. Bodice it’s a big wide, so will pinch it in next time. Wore it over a hoop - not included, and with the proper QoH wig - not included. Comfortable to wear, not too warm, stitching seem solid. Love this costume, as did the jury at our costume contest:)
customer_reviews.author: Polarprincess

customer_reviews.title: OMG - Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a costume for a production of "Alice," and the teen who played the role of the queen was absolutely thrilled. She looked gorgeous. We were also delighted to see that the eye-popping cleavage is only relevant if you actually HAVE eye-popping cleavage -- so our teen queen did not look like a sex kitten, but rather like a real queen of hearts. The fabric was quite nice given the price, and everything stood up as shown. We put a big crinoline underneath, and it was ideal. NOTE the crown and sceptre don't come with the outfit; we made our own.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This costume did not disappoint. The size was accurate, the dress was full, and exactly as pictured. Will definitely purchase from seller in future
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Nice costume!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this costume! Won a costume contest as well. My only complaints are having to find all of the accessories to go with it (scepter, crown, etc) and it was a little itchy/scratchy.
customer_reviews.author: Zenbird09

customer_reviews.title: The quality was good, corset fit well
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 8/10 so I ordered a large to be on the safe side. It fit perfectly. I'm 5'4" and the length was appropriate with a 1" heel. Many, many compliments on this costume. The quality was good, corset fit well, and the corset did not slide as some had stated in their reviews. To make the collar stand up, I hung the dress up and put the collar up and this seemed to be the magic trick.
customer_reviews.author: MBatton

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money. Had to shorten as I am short.
customer_reviews.text: We always dress up @ work for Holiday celebrations @work. All the employees wait to see what each associate will be dressed like. It always is a special treat to not have to make my own costume. Thanks for being there to make my purchases. Jayne
customer_reviews.author: Jayne R.

customer_reviews.title: Felt very regal.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. You will want to wear a slip as the front panel is rather sheer, and since petticoat is extremely coarse. Otherwise, very elegant for the price. I loved wearing it and given I'm a 12-14 I didn't expect it would look that good on me since the model is about a 2, but it really did. I preferred the collar down instead of standing, but I also had a substantial wig on to dress it up so that may have forced it to lay down anyhow. Added some red/black false eyelashes and a flamingo crop. Halloween away!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Luke

customer_reviews.title: I love this it fits great
customer_reviews.text: I love this it fits great. I am normally a large in stuff and I was worried about the standard size. But it does fit the arms are a little tight. The only thing I don't like is I get the queen of hearts is suppose to be big in the movie but I feel so wide in it. My personal body image is not great at all. But it is for Halloween and it is suppose to look this way. Also the front of the dress is see through if you were to wear red panties or black you could for sure see them. so be careful with that.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Scott

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This fit as expected after reading comments from other customers. It was a bit snug in the arms and chest, but I was able to make due. You will definitely want a slip or leggings as the bottom is very easy to see through.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Forum Alice In Wonderland Queen Of Hearts Costume, Red
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this costume. It is even better than I imagined ... it looks exactly like the photo. It is very well made and is made with quality material for a costume. I am a size 12 and it fits perfectly, but it is stretchy material so i believe the description is correct ... i think it would fit anyone from size 5 to size 14. I am so excited to wear it to our upcoming Halloween party. I wouldn't hesitate order from this company again. I'm so impressed I'm already scoping out these costumes for Halloween 2014.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy S

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty costume. I bought this for my tween daughter who is 5’ tall. It was about 5 inches to long for her but we made it work. She didn’t mind holding it up as she walked. We did put a long sleeve shirt under the costume as the top does swoop very low. That would be the only thing that I didn’t like about the costume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Dress was perfect - plenty of stretch for fit - comfortable and pretty substantial. Better than expected - got lots of comments If doing for Halloween - definitely get the wig
customer_reviews.author: Renee V.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty in person
customer_reviews.text: Cute cute cute! I purchased this for my mom to wear on Halloween. Super pretty ! The price was great and the fit decent . The dress is a bit long she’s 5ft3 and a size 16 but we can fix that
customer_reviews.author: Peachesmgee

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect length and very comfortable. 5'8" 150lbs ordered a small. The red and black material is a soft velvet and the white is tool. The white tool in the skirt is see through.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea but waist way too short.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but the waist was way too short. The hips flared out right under my chest and couldn't wear since wasn't very flattering. Had to buy another costume to wear. Didn't want to waste money on shipping to send back. Cute idea but waist was way too short. If waist was actually at my waist I would have loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Fit me great but i ordered an XL which is i believe is considered a 18. I typically wear a 14/16 jeans. And im not nearly as big boobed as the model so had to wear cami
customer_reviews.author: Julie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Is a pretty costume, better for someone with a shorter torso
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful costume, it is very well made and surprisingly cheap for the quality you get. I am 5'8 and an hour glass figure, a size 8-10 and this costume did not flatter my waist. It was too short and bunched up for my torso. I think this costume would look better on a shorter person. My torso was too long for the costume. I ended up pulling it down and putting a waist sincher corset over it. You will look classy and pretty in this costume and you wont freeze on halloween night.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Won 1st Place
customer_reviews.text: I received so many compliments on this costume I wore to work. I actually won 1st place!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome costume!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great costume for this price!! I got many compliments all night and am looking for an excuse to wear it again!
customer_reviews.author: CAFEINITA

customer_reviews.title: Too long and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Halloween costume for work. It was wayyyyy to long. I'm 5'3'' and several inches of it were dragging. I also had to buy another corset because this one didn't tie right and made me look fat. The material is extremely itchy and it sheds a ridiculous amount of glitter. I ended up returning it and didn't get to dress up for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Too small in chest area. Otherwise good quality stitching and material.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaTackittLong

customer_reviews.title: Love love it!!
customer_reviews.text: So worth the price love it fits perfect size i got little big and had to take in still needs little more taken in or good pushup bra to help lol i havnt dressed up for Halloween in years from no self confidence but this costume i feel amazing in!!
customer_reviews.author: dixie

customer_reviews.title: Fit great. Good quality. Lots of glitter
customer_reviews.text: I really liked thos outfit. As a mom going trick or treating I wanted feminine but not too trashy. This was perfect. I had to double check my chest a couple times but it was reasonable. The glitter kept falling as I was putting it on and taking it off. Glitter was everywhere lol but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dinahmo Garske

customer_reviews.title: Sheer in the front
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Very see through in the front. (Wear black leggings underneath) I have to return it for a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: OB-GYN Nurse Manager

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This dress fit me so good. I took the belt off as it didn't fit properly but the dress was so pretty without it. I'm only 5'2 and it was pretty long, so I just hemmed only the front white part with my glue gun, love the glue gun. The dress look perfect on me with the petticoat I worn under it.
customer_reviews.author: LISA K.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute costume but it’s a little on the big size but I think reviews stated it ran small- I would order your true size! I agree with other reviewers as it does leave a glitter trail (haha) Pictures to come!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: in love with the queen of hearts! ♡ ♡
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant on getting this thinking it's too cheap to be true and they were also out of my size so I had to go with the "standard size" but I took the risk anyways and so glad I did. I have some meat on my bones 5'4 150 normally wear a size 8/10 and the standard fit perfect! Yes the white part of the costume is not cloth more like a netting as others have stated but I had no problem with it being see through. I got compliments everywhere I went and even won a halloween costume contest! If you're debating between costumes definitely get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful well made costume!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is great! I'm 5'5 1/2 200# and the XL fit. I may have been able to wear the LG, but not sure. The length goes all the way to the floor. I love the velvet material. A little itchy in some areas that doesn't have velvet, but not bad. I feel the quality is very good. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C.

customer_reviews.title: Received a stained used costume
customer_reviews.text: This arrived used with stains and twigs in the bag !!
customer_reviews.author: Jennywren

customer_reviews.title: The bustier does not lay nicely over the waist and it has two pieces of ...
customer_reviews.text: The bustier does not lay nicely over the waist and it has two pieces of fabric to fasten it closed rather than actual ties that would cinch tightly around the waste. The collar does not stand up as shown in the picture and is wrinkled and bent out of shape. I may be able to steam it back into place however the entire dress is so big that I won't even be able to wear it for Halloween. The package says it fits up to size 14-16 and I think that's exactly what size this dress is.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: very nice and well made
customer_reviews.text: It is a very pretty costume but I had to hem it. It is for a costume party
customer_reviews.author: Berta

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I love this costume. It is beautiful and a perfect fit, including length. It slips over your head, no zippers. I am 5’6” tall, 115 lbs, 34-24-34, size 2. I ordered a size small.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Justice-Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Great Material
customer_reviews.text: It's a great costume, but it runs very big and long.
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This product was BETTER than I had expected. Usually, costumes seem very cheaply made, but this one was worth the price. It looks beautiful and worked well for my production.
customer_reviews.author: sgteach11

customer_reviews.title: Glitter explosion!
customer_reviews.text: Glitter everywhere! I only tried it on in my house and I had red glitter from one end of the house to the other! It runs small too so when I finally pried myself out of it I took it outside to put it back in its packaging. Glitter all over the porch now. It is a beautiful costume however and doesn't look cheap. But Good Lord at the glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rotthoff

customer_reviews.title: Good outfit with no major problems
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for the wife for Halloween. Not too much to say - it was decent quality for a not outrageous price. Didn't notice any big problems with the construction. The sewing and fabric held up to a day of use well enough. As others have mentioned, the corset thing is pretty flimsy - very much for show and only ties in one place. Just don't expect anything more
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: This costume is beautiful. It looks just like the picture. I ordered it for my daughter, who is 5' and it was pretty long, so I had to hem about 5 inches off. There is no zipper/buttons on the back, so it's a bit of a challenge getting it on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Wins costume contests
customer_reviews.text: The costume was amazing! The only thing that I suggest is that you get a corset to finish the dress as the “belt” they provide doesn’t enhance anything. ;) —also (as you can see) I ended up winning a costume contest as well-get the wig/hat too. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: This costume is of higher quality than most bagged costumes. I am a size 10-12 and it fits great with room to spare. The corset doesn't cinch up as tight as I would like, but otherwise this is exactly what I was looking for. I am a 38D chest and the costume shows a small (nice) amount of cleavage. Everything is nicely layered and of decent quality. The collar even stands up on its own. I am 5'7'' and with a small heel the skirt will skim the floor. I bought the matching scepter and will buy a gold crown. I was pleasantly surprised with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Itchy costume looked weird on me
customer_reviews.text: I thought this looked weird on me , I ended up picking another costume for Halloween
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made costume. I will be adding a bridal slip with multiple layers but it's not necessary to make this outfit complete!
customer_reviews.author: Rene' F.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable to wear (Makes me itchy) and shiny powder goes everywhere . Already returned
customer_reviews.author: Kathieee

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this to Mickey's not so scary Halloween party. I got lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: So I ended up cuting the dress above my knees and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium thinking it would fit perfectly and would be long enough . When I Tried it on it went 5in above my ankles. I'm 5'11. So I ended up cuting the dress above my knees and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Halloween costume so far!
customer_reviews.text: Had sooo much fun in this costume!! Nice fit once a corset was added! I don’t even know how I’m going to top this costume next year and stay within the same price range!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Howell

customer_reviews.title: It fits great
customer_reviews.text: It fits great. A little low cut but expected that. I will have to wear a camisole under it so I can wear it to work.
customer_reviews.author: stanglady

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with costume. Even fit over my cast on left arm. I did use a different corset because this one had to be tied and I couldn't use my arm. I had one that was velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Ajax

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved this costume
customer_reviews.text: This dress was a big hit at the Halloween parties. The sleeves are a bit itchy, but you don't notice after a drink or two. I am a size 2-4. I was worried about it being too big but it was fine. Though I did have to wear a cami.
customer_reviews.author: KnowsFashion

customer_reviews.title: Nice costume
customer_reviews.text: The costume is decent quality but it ended up being larger than I expected so I had to return it. If it would have fit I would have been happy to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the higher end of the fit spectrum (i'm normally a 14 in dresses). its a cute costume. The white in front is a bit sea through so i'll have to wear shorts under it. I like that it's modest. I'm not a fan of the corset at all though.. i'll still use it but its just a tie around belt.. kind of a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, as other reviews have mentioned the black "corset" ...
customer_reviews.text: This was/is a very cute costume I have worn it twice now, once for comicon and once for halloween. Very nice, as other reviews have mentioned the black "corset" is flimsy and I haven't used it either time I wore the costume. Be prepared to get red glitter everywhere! but very fun.
customer_reviews.author: Lecha

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: It really runs large, also had to hem,very long on me Im only 5 ft. Tall. But is .are very well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This costume exceeded my expectations. I absolutely love how it fits and the material used for the process of making it. I can't wait to wear it for my show!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Contest Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I won a costume contest with this dress. I bought a better corset, and an excellent wig. The dress is really pretty, tho a bit long for me. (5'5") I actually pinned up the front hem, and let the back trail. Best of all, I threw the dress in the washer afterward, and it came out perfect for next time! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Sanphy

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old daughter an knew I would need to take it up a bit and also at the bust. But it fits great otherwise. The quality of the material was better than I expected. Super happy daughter - what more could I want!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the standard size and it was a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the standard size and it was a bit too big (but not terribly) in the bust and waist area. As other reviewers mentioned, the corset was a headache. It wouldn't stay in place and wasn't substantial enough to maintain a tailored look for the duration of the evening. The collar also didn't stay in place. Overall, it was worth the money and would order other products from the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this dress for Halloween. I expected it to fit a little big because I read other reviews. Not everything is one size fits all. I would say that this dress fits a woman who is between a size 8 and 12. 14 would be pushing it and 16 definately not. Anything smaller than a size 8 and you would be swimming in it.
customer_reviews.author: Robison

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this costume
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this costume!! I won a costume contest wearing it! The only issue I had was trying to keep the white collar to stay up. I'm sure there's something you can do in advance to remedy that. It does have a pettiskirt under it, which I cut out because it made me look too 'hippy.' Just a forewarning, the hearts on the costume are made of gitter, so you will end up getting glitter everywhere. I am a busty DD size 6-8 and got the medium, it fit perfectly. Overall, this costume was exactly what I had expected!!
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

product_meta.title: Forum Alice In Wonderland Queen Of Hearts Costume
product_meta.description:
Choosing a costume for a party is a task in itself. But not when we are around. Forum Novelties Halloween costumes are practical, fun, clever and easy to carry. Right from infants to children of all ages and adults, we have an outfit for everyone, and every theme is it something downright scary, funky or out of the box. Shop from our wide variety of costume collection and make your choice – spooky, funny or simply adorable.

Features:



Material: 100% polyester Comfortable fit and easy movement Available in all sizes Value for money Crown and Scepter are not included.

Wash Care:

Whenever it needs a cleaning, hand wash with cold water and mild detergent. Line dry. Do not bleach. Do not iron.
feature_bullets: REALISTIC DETAILING: A beautiful long multicoloured dress with bell sleeve, white puffy underskirt with red hearts.
COMFORTABLE FIT: Lightweight, breathable and soft fabric offers a great corset.
VERSATILE: Great for Halloween trick and treat, role plays, story enactments, dress up games, fancy dress, stage performances and more.
PACK INCLUDES: The package includes the gown of queen of hearts only. Crown and Scepter are not included.
EXCELLENT QUALITY: Made by Forum Novelties, a leader in Halloween costume and accessories for more than 30 years.
